sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar
opposite another
, stoji nasproti drugi.

seg.quote: The hotel is opposite a railway station.

sense.def:
Stran ali del, ki je
opposite
, je tisti, ki je pri nečem najbolj oddaljen od nas.

seg.quote: ...on the opposite side of the street.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
opposite
opisujemo stvari iste vrste, ki se v nečem kar najbolj razlikujejo. Na primer, sever in jug sta nasprotni smeri neba, zmaga in poraz pa nasprotna izida tekmovanja.

seg.quote: I wanted to impress them but probably had the opposite effect.
Paul turned and walked in the opposite direction.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
the opposite of the other
, je v nečem povsem drugačna od druge stvari.

seg.quote: My interpretation was the absolute opposite of Olivier's.
My brother is just the opposite. He loves sport.
